body: Also, it said 'oshimai' at the end which means 'the end', I think...

I can't understand that much Japanese but I can read some of the characters. Not to be pessimistic but if someone can translate the afterwords at the end, why was the author saying sorry or something? Did the story get discontinued or what?
I like your cheering spirit @sexdemon4978 cuz I love Goban's works! Yay! Your high spirit is contagious!

Yay! Second Chapter!
I cant read it, but who cares!?
